message.body: Do you remember what Ms. Roberts would do when people got over 90% or whatever on a bio test? Something with a pizza party?? My friends and I are having a discussion.
What? Haha I have no idea but something might jog my memory. Like she had a party after school that those kids could come to?
I don't know, but the reason I thought of it was because it made clear her expectations that people wouldn't do that well on the test. Maybe some kind of coupon? Maybe it wasn't about pizza...
It seems vaguely familiar. It strikes me as more of an incentive though.
